item.title: 去中心化加密货币交易所 dYdX 计划年底前进入美国市场
item.description: 顶级去中心化加密货币交易平台之一 dYdX 的总裁在接受路透社采访时表示，dYdX 正准备在今年年底前进入美国市场，这是这家以衍生品为重点的交易所的一次转变，此前美国用户无法使用该平台。【原文：One of the top decentralized cryptocurrency trading platforms, dYdX, is preparing to enter the U.S. market by the end of the year, in a shift for the derivatives-focused exchange that was previously not available to American users, the president of dYdX told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 贝森特称中国本季将购买 1200 万吨大豆
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四表示，在长达数月的关税战停止了对美国本季大豆的所有采购后，中国已同意在本季至1月期间购买1200万吨美国大豆，低于上一季的2250万吨。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Thursday that China has agreed to buy 12 million metric tons of American soybeans during the current season through January, down from 22.5 million tons in the prior season after a months-long tariff battle halted all purchases of the current U.S. harvest.】

item.title: 看涨期权交易将推动标普 500 指数在 7,000 点附近波动
item.description: 据期权专家称，一波看涨期权交易放大了美国股市向另一个重要里程碑迈进的步伐，并使交易商们做好了在未来几天或几周内市场波动可能会被夸大的准备。【原文：A wave of bullish options trading has amplified the U.S. stock market's advance toward another major milestone and left dealers positioned so that market swings are likely to be exaggerated in coming days or weeks, according to options specialists.】

item.title: 诺和诺德改变策略，大胆突袭辉瑞肥胖症交易
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）迟迟未能阻止辉瑞（Pfizer）对美国肥胖症生物技术公司 Metsera 的收购，这标志着这家丹麦制药商正在积极转变，在新任首席执行官和董事会的领导下，力图在减肥药市场重振雄风。【原文：Novo Nordisk's late bid to hijack Pfizer's takeover of U.S. obesity biotech Metsera marks an aggressive shift from the Danish drugmaker as it seeks to regain ground in the weight-loss drug market under a new CEO and board.】

item.title: 欧盟文件显示，欧盟希望借助网络平台打击混合威胁
item.description: 据路透社报道，根据欧盟委员会将于下月公布的一项提案，受具有里程碑意义的欧盟技术规则约束的在线平台必须检测和应对欧洲的混合威胁。【原文：Online platforms subject to landmark EU tech rules could be required to detect and tackle hybrid threats in Europe under a proposal set to be announced by the European Commission next month and seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储最新降息对您的资金意味着什么--即使下一次降息还不确定
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会周三将其关键利率目标下调了四分之一个百分点。但美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）告诫说，2025年再次降息并不能保证。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve cut its key interest-rate target by a quarter of a percentage point on Wednesday. But Fed Chair Jerome Powell cautioned that another move in 2025 is not guaranteed.】

item.title: 阿肯色州力争成为美国锂电中心，克服中国竞争和技术挑战
item.description: 阿肯色州在争夺成为美国锂生产中心的过程中面临着中国的激烈竞争、市场价格下挫和技术挑战，但该州官员和行业高管本周表示，这些障碍都是可以克服的。【原文：Arkansas faces stiff Chinese competition, sagging market prices and technological challenges as it vies to become the hub for U.S. lithium production, obstacles that state officials and industry executives said this week are surmountable.】

item.title: 环球音乐集团因泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的销售增长而收入超过预期
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周四公布的第三季度营收高于市场预期，泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的新作推动了实体专辑的销售。【原文：Universal Music Group on Thursday reported third-quarter revenue above market expectations with Taylor Swift's new release boosting physical album sales.】

item.title: 欧盟技术负责人维尔库宁将于周五会见芯片制造商 Nexperia
item.description: 欧盟技术负责人亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）将于周五会见芯片制造商耐克斯派瑞（Nexperia），她是在周四早些时候与英飞凌（Infineon）、意法半导体（STMicroelectronics）、恩智浦（NXP）和 Acea 的首席执行官举行虚拟会议后在 X 上表示的。【原文：EU tech chief Henna Virkkunen will meet chipmaker Nexperia on Friday, she said on X after hosting virtual meetings with the chief executives of Infineon , STMicroelectronics, NXP and Acea earlier on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国肥胖症生物技术公司 Metsera 成为诺和、辉瑞竞购战的焦点
item.description: Metsera 已成为肥胖症药物市场的热门产品。【原文：Metsera has become the obesity drug market's hottest ticket.】

item.title: Palantir起诉离职组建 "山寨 "Percepta人工智能公司的工程师
item.description: 帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies）周四起诉了两名前高级工程师，指控他们利用该软件公司的秘密信息创办了一家 "山寨 "公司--Percepta AI。【原文：Palantir Technologies on Thursday sued two of its former senior engineers, accusing them of using the software company's secret information to launch a "copycat" firm, Percepta AI.】

item.title: 全球央行对降息趋于谨慎
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会周三将利率下调四分之一个百分点后，与其他主要利率制定者重新保持一致，但由于华盛顿停摆使其预测镜头变得模糊不清，美联储回绝了市场对其将继续下调利率的押注。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve has moved back into line with other major rate setters after it cut rates by a quarter point on Wednesday but pushed back against market bets that it would keep going as the Washington shutdown fogs up its forecasting lens.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息称长江和记与伊利亚特考虑合并意大利业务
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，香港企业集团长江和记一直在研究将其意大利电信部门 Wind Tre 与法国电信集团 Iliad 的意大利业务合并的可能性。【原文：Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison has been studying a potential tie-up of its Italian telecom unit Wind Tre and the Italian operations of French telecoms group Iliad, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: C.H.罗宾逊股价创历史新高，以人工智能驱动的涨势抵御货运低迷
item.description: 罗宾逊公司（C.H. Robinson）的股价周四大涨超过 20%，创下历史新高，投资者对这家全球货运代理公司因人工智能驱动的效率而实现季度利润增长感到高兴，而此时物流业的其他公司却在苦苦挣扎。【原文：Shares of C.H. Robinson surged more than 20% to a record high on Thursday as investors cheered the global freight forwarder's quarterly profit beat due to AI-driven efficiencies at a time when the rest of the logistics sector has struggled.】

item.title: 芯科股东拒绝 90 亿美元的 CoreWeave 收购要约，交易终止
item.description: 加密矿机制造商 Core Scientific 周四结束了出售给 CoreWeave 的交易，因为股东投票反对该提议，这标志着长达数月的投资者和代理机构反对该协议的运动达到了高潮。【原文：Crypto miner Core Scientific on Thursday ended a deal for its sale to CoreWeave after shareholders voted against the proposal, marking the culmination of months-long investor and proxy campaigns against the agreement.】

item.title: 时装设计师 Bob Mackie 就服装系列起诉 JCPenney
item.description: 曾为雪儿、卡罗尔-伯内特、埃尔顿-约翰和泰勒-斯威夫特等名人设计服装的时装设计师兼服装师鲍勃-麦基（Bob Mackie）起诉 JCPenney，称其未经许可使用自己的姓名、签名和肖像销售服装。【原文：Bob Mackie, the fashion designer and costumer who has outfitted celebrities like Cher, Carol Burnett, Elton John and Taylor Swift, has sued JCPenney for allegedly using his name, signature and likeness without permission to sell apparel.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动万亿美元科技估值，芯片制造商押注创纪录
item.description: 10 月份，顶级科技公司创下了新的估值里程碑，这些公司的股价因预期人工智能热潮将推动对人工智能芯片和计算基础设施的强劲需求而攀升。【原文：Top technology companies hit fresh valuation milestones in October, as their shares climbed on expectations of robust demand for AI chips and computing infrastructure driven by the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官表示，Stellantis 已成立 "作战室 "处理 Nexperia 芯片危机
item.description: Stellantis公司首席执行官周四表示，Stellantis已经成立了一个 "作战室"，以应对荷兰Nexperia集团因中美贸易战而出现的问题可能导致的芯片短缺。【原文：Stellantis has set up a "war room" to address possible chip shortages stemming from issues at Dutch group Nexperia linked to the U.S.-China trade war, the automaker's CEO said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由 KKR 支持的 ContourGlobal 为美国太阳能项目完成 3.5 亿美元的一揽子融资计划
item.description: 美国投资基金 KKR 旗下的 ContourGlobal 集团周四表示，该集团已获得价值超过 3.5 亿美元的一揽子融资，以支持其在科罗拉多州的太阳能设施建设。【原文：ContourGlobal has secured a funding package worth more than $350 million to support its solar installations in Colorado, the group owned by U.S. investment fund KKR said on Thursday.】

item.title: 凯兰诺瓦因早餐产品需求回升，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 凯兰诺瓦公司周四公布的第三季度销售额和利润超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于市场对其即食早餐和零食（包括 Pringles 和 Pop-Tarts）的强劲需求，尽管宏观经济的不确定性依然存在。【原文：Kellanova beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter sales and profit on Thursday, driven by resilient demand for its ready-to-eat breakfast items and snacks, including Pringles and Pop-Tarts, even as macroeconomic uncertainty looms.】

item.title: 中国航空公司在暑运中恢复盈利，但挑战依然存在
item.description: 在暑运旺季的带动下，中国三大航空公司在第三季度实现了一年来首次集体盈利，但由于供过于求继续拖累国内航空市场，这种复苏可能稍纵即逝。【原文：China's three biggest airlines posted their first collective quarterly profit in a year in the third quarter on the back of the peak summer season, but the recovery could be fleeting as oversupply continues to drag down the domestic aviation market.】

item.title: 国际纸业因 10 亿美元减值费用而转为季度亏损
item.description: 国际纸业公司周四出现季度亏损，原因是该包装公司因出售纤维素纤维业务而产生了 10 亿美元的费用。【原文：International Paper swung to a quarterly loss on Thursday, as the packaging firm recorded a $1 billion charge related to the sale of its cellulose fibers business.】

item.title: 卫星制造商 EnduroSat 从谷歌风投等公司获得 1.04 亿美元融资
item.description: EnduroSat 周四表示，它已从包括谷歌风险投资公司（Google Ventures）、卢森堡资本公司（Lux Capital）和欧洲投资委员会（European Investment Council）在内的投资者那里筹集到 1.04 亿美元，这家总部位于保加利亚的公司正在扩大其中小型卫星的生产规模。【原文：EnduroSat said on Thursday it has raised $104 million from investors, including Google Ventures, Lux Capital and the European Investment Council, as the Bulgaria-based company scales up production of its small and midsized satellites.】

item.title: 债券发行活动强劲，标普全球上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 由于强劲的债券发行活动推动了评级业务的增长，S&P Global 周四上调了年度盈利预期，使其股价在收盘前上涨了 2.4%。【原文：S&P Global raised its annual earnings forecasts on Thursday, as robust bond issuance activity drove growth in its ratings business, sending its shares up 2.4% before the bell.】

item.title: 好时上调年度预测，因为购物者会选择价格更高的食品
item.description: 好时（Hershey）周四上调了全年销售额和利润预期，此前公布的季度业绩好于预期，好时将赌注押在对其价格较高的巧克力和零食的强劲需求上。【原文：Hershey on Thursday raised its annual sales and profit forecasts after posting better-than-expected quarterly results, betting on robust demand for its higher-priced chocolates and snacks.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，美国能源部长赖特表示，美国已准备好向中国出售更多石油和天然气
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）表示，如果中国政府减少从俄罗斯购买石油和天然气，美国准备向中国出售更多石油和天然气。【原文：Energy Secretary Chris Wright said the U.S. is prepared to sell more oil and natural gas to China if Beijing reduces purchases from Russia, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国财政部贝森特称美联储的措辞显示他们 "停留在过去
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四对美联储将利率下调四分之一个百分点的决定表示赞赏，但他表示，有评论对美联储今年再次降息表示怀疑，这表明美联储需要进行重大改革。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Thursday applauded the Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point, but said comments casting doubt on another rate cut this year showed the institution needed a major revamp.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Meta 寻求发行至少 250 亿美元债券
item.description: 据彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 公司的债券销售目标是至少 250 亿美元。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is targeting at least $25 billion in a bond sale, Bloomberg news reported on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国汽车业计划建立临时芯片信息平台以缓解供应风险
item.description: 德国汽车工业协会（VDA）周四表示，该协会计划通过中立的第三方建立一个临时信息平台，以帮助制造商和供应商避免可能出现的芯片短缺所带来的负面影响。【原文：Germany's automotive industry association VDA plans to set up a temporary information platform via a neutral third party to help manufacturers and suppliers avoid the negative consequences of a possible chip shortage, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于烟草需求低迷，Altria 预计全年利润不高
item.description: 烟草巨头 Altria 周四预测的年度利润将大大低于市场预期，原因是对其香烟和口服烟替代品（如尼古丁袋）的需求下降。【原文：Tobacco giant Altria forecast annual profit largely below market expectations on Thursday, hurt by lower demand for its cigarettes and oral smoking alternatives such as on! nicotine pouches.】
